title: KHR_materials_diffuse_transmission glTF Material Extension
description: glTF extension that defines the diffuse transmission of the material.

diffuseTransmissionFactor.description: The percentage of light that is diffusely transmitted through the surface.
diffuseTransmissionFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The percentage of non-specularly reflected light that is transmitted through the surface via a Lambertian diffuse transmission.

diffuseTransmissionTexture.description: A texture that defines the percentage of light transmitted through the surface.
diffuseTransmissionTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: A texture that defines the strength of the diffuse transmission effect, stored in the alpha (A) channel. Will be multiplied by the `diffuseTransmissionFactor` value.

diffuseTransmissionColorFactor.description: The color of the transmitted light.
diffuseTransmissionColorFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The color of the transmitted light.

diffuseTransmissionColorTexture.description: A texture that defines the color of the transmitted light
diffuseTransmissionColorTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: A texture that defines the color of the transmitted light, stored in the RGB channels and encoded in sRGB. This texture will be multiplied by the `diffuseTransmissionColorFactor` value.
